metadata.list: function Main(html){return jsoups(html,'div > div > div:nth-child(3) > div');}
metadata.name: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'div > div > a > h2[class=post-title]');}
metadata.author: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'p.slr');}
metadata.img: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'div > div > a > img@attr->src');}

detail.author: 作者无法获取
detail.upDate: function Main(html){return strmiddle(jsoup(html,'#app > div.episode > div'),'剧集（','）');}
